mapper.select: SELECT PTL.TODO_ID , PTL.TODO_TITLE , PTL.TODO_CONTENT , PTL.TODO_WRITER , PTL.TODO_WRITE_DATE , PTL.TODO_MODIFY_DATE , PTL.TODO_REMOVE_WHETHER , PTL.COMPLETE_WHETHER , PTL.PROJECT_WORK_ID FROM PROJECT_TODO_LIST PTL LEFT JOIN PROJECT_WORK PW ON PTL.PROJECT_WORK_ID = PW.PROJECT_WORK_ID WHERE PTL.PROJECT_WORK_ID = #{projectWorkId} AND TODO_REMOVE_WHETHER IS NULL ORDER BY TODO_ID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_TODO_LIST SET COMPLETE_WHETHER = 'C' WHERE TODO_ID = #{todoId}
UPDATE PROJECT_TODO_LIST SET COMPLETE_WHETHER = '' WHERE TODO_ID = #{todoId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE PROJECT_TODO_LIST SET TODO_REMOVE_WHETHER = 'Y' WHERE TODO_ID = #{todoId}
